chapter.text: 56|1|jab hone vaalee, ho jaayegee.
56|2|usaka hona koee jhooth nahin hai.
56|3|neecha-ooncha karane[1] vaalee.
56|4|jab dharatee tezee se dolane lagegee.
56|5|aur choor-choor kar diye jaayenge parvat.
56|6|phir ho jaayenge bikharee huee dhool.
56|7|tatha tum ho jaoge teen samooh.
56|8|to daayen vaale, to kya hain daayen vaale
56|9|aur baayen vaale, to kya hain baayen vaale
56|10|aur agragaamee to agragaamee hee hain.
56|11|vahee sameep kiye[1] hue hain.
56|12|ve sukhon ke svargon mein honge.
56|13|bahut-se agale logon mein se.
56|14|tatha kuchh pichhale logon mein se honge.
56|15|svarn se bune hue takhton par.
56|16|takiye lagaaye unapar, ek-doosare ke sammukh (aaseen) honge.
56|17|phirate honge unakee seva ke lie baalak, jo sada (baalak) rahenge.
56|18|pyaale tatha suraahî€¼iyaan lekar tatha madira ke chhalakate pyaale.
56|19|na to sir chakaraayega unase, na ve nirbodh honge.
56|20|tatha jo phal ve chaahenge.
56|21|tatha pakshee ka jo maans ve chaahenge.
56|22|aur goriyaan bade nainon vaalee.
56|23|chhupaakar rakhee hueen motiyon ke samaan.
56|24|usake badale, jo ve (sansaar mein) karate rahe.
56|25|nahin sunenge unamen vyarth baat aur na paap kee baat.
56|26|keval salaam hee salaam kee dhvani hogee.
56|27|aur daayen vaale, kya (hee bhaagyashaalee) hain daayen vaale
56|28|bin kaante kee bairee mein honge.
56|29|tatha tah par tah kelon mein.
56|30|phailee huee chhaaya[1] mein.
56|31|aur pravaahit jal mein.
56|32|tatha bahut-se phalon mein.
56|33|jo na samaapt honge, na roke jaayenge.
56|34|aur oonche bistar par.
56|35|hamane banaaya hai (unakee) patniyon ko ek vishesh roop se.
56|36|hamane banaay hai unhen kumaariyaan.
56|37|premikaayen samaayu.
56|38|daahine vaalon ke lie.
56|39|bahut-se agalon mein se honge.
56|40|tatha bahut-se pichhalon mein se.
56|41|aur baayen vaale, to kya hain baayen vaale
56|42|ve garm vaayu tatha khaulate jal mein (honge).
56|43|tatha kaale dhuven kee chhaaya mein.
56|44|jo na sheetal hoga aur na sukhad.
56|45|vaastav mein, ve isase pahale (sansaar mein) sampann (sukhee) the.
56|46|tatha duraagrah karate the maha paapon par.
56|47|tatha kaha karate the ki kya jab ham mar jaayenge tatha ho jaayenge dhool aur asthiyaan, to kya ham avashy punah jeevit honge
56|48|aur kya hamaare poorvaj (bhee)
56|49|aap kah den ki nihsandeh sab agale tatha pichhale.
56|50|avashy ekatr kiye jaayenge ek nirdhaarit din ke samay.
56|51|phir tum, he kupatho! jhuthalaane vaalo
56|52|avashy khaane vaale ho zaqqoom (thohad) ke vrksh se.
56|53|tatha bharane vaale ho usase (apane) udar.
56|54|tatha peene vaale ho usapar se khaulata jal.
56|55|phir peene vaale ho pyaase[1] oont ke samaan.
56|56|yahee unaka atithi satkaar hai, pratikaar (pralay) ke din.
56|57|hamane hee utpann kiya hai tumhen, phir tum vishvaas kyon nahin karate
56|58|kya tumane ye vichaar kiya ki jo veery tum (garbhaashayon mein) giraate ho.
56|59|kya tum use shishu banaate ho ya ham banaane vaale hain
56|60|hamane nirdhaarit kiya hai tumhaare beech maran ko tatha ham vivash hone vaale nahin hain.
56|61|ki badal den tumhaare roop aur tumhen bana den us roop mein, jise tum nahin jaanate.
56|62|tatha tumane to jaan liya hai pratham utpatti ko phir tum shiksha grahan kyon nahin karate
56|63|phir kya tumane vichaar kiya ki usamen jo tum bote ho
56|64|kya tum use ugaate ho ya ham use ugaane vaale hain
56|65|yadi ham chaahen, to use bhus bana den, phir tum baaten banaate rah jao.
56|66|vastutah, ham dandit kar diye gaye.
56|67|balki ham (jeevika se) vanchit kar diye gaye.
56|68|phir tumane vichaar kiya us paanee mein, jo tum peete ho
56|69|kya tumane use barasaaya hai baadal se athava ham use barasaane vaale hain.
56|70|yadi ham chaahen, to use khaaree kar den, phir tum aabhaaree (krtagy) kyon nahin hote
56|71|kya tumane us agni ko dekha, jise tum sulagaate ho.
56|72|kya tumane utpann kiya hai usake vrksh ko ya ham utpann karane vaale hain
56|73|hamane hee banaaya use shikshaaprad tatha yaatriyon ke laabhadaayak.
56|74|atah, (he nabee!) aap pavitrata ka varnan karen apane maha paalanahaar ke naam kee.
56|75|main shapath leta hoon sitaaron ke sthaanon kee
56|76|aur ye nishchay ek badee shapath hai, yadi tum samajho.
56|77|vaastav mein, ye aadaraneey[1] quraan hai.
56|78|surakshit[1] pustak mein.
56|79|ise pavitr log hee chhoote hain.
56|80|avatarit kiya gaya hai sarvalok ke paalanahaar kee or se.
56|81|phir kya tum is vaani (quraan) kee apeksha karate ho
56|82|tatha banaate ho apana bhaag ki ise tum jhuthalaate ho
56|83|phir kyon nahin jab praan gale ko pahunchate hain.
56|84|aur tum us samay dekhate rahate ho.
56|85|tatha ham adhik sameep hote hain usake tumase, parantu tum nahin dekh sakate.
56|86|to yadi tum kisee ke aadheen na ho.
56|87|to us (praan) ko pher kyon nahin laate, yadi tum sachche ho
56|88|phir yadi vah (praanee) sameepavartiyon mein hai.
56|89|to usake lie sukh tatha uttam jeevika tatha sukh bhara svarg hai.
56|90|aur yadi vah daayen vaalon mein se hai.
56|91|to salaam hai tere lie daayen vaalon mein hone ke kaaran.
56|92|aur yadi vah hai jhuthalaane vaale kupathon mein se.
56|93|to atithi satkaar hai khaulate paanee se.
56|94|tatha narak mein pravesh.
56|95|vaastav mein, yahee nishchay saty hai.
56|96|atah, (he nabee!) aap pavitrata ka varnan karen apane maha paalanahaar ke naam kee.
